title: 403: Adamâ€™s Journey from Fat to Fit, Avoiding Holiday Fat Gain, Intermittent Fasting & Performance & MORE
description: Kimera-Quah! iTunes Review Winners! In this BONUS episode of Quah, sponsored by Kimera Koffee (kimerakoffee.com, code "mindpump" for 10% off), Sal, Adam & Justin answer Pump Head questions about how long it took for Adam to go from fat to fit, the effects of intermittent fasting on performance/athletics, a good approach to avoiding holiday fat gain and if chiropractic care works. Have Sal, Adam & Justin personally train you with a new video every day on our new YouTube channel, Mind Pump TV. Be sure to Subscribe for updates. Get MAPS Anabolic, MAPS Performance, MAPS Aesthetic and the Butt Builder Blueprint (The RGB Super Bundle) packaged together at a substantial DISCOUNT at www.mindpumpmedia.com. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Each week our favorite reviewers are announced on the show and sent Mind Pump T-shirts! Have questions for Mind Pump? Each Monday on Instagram (@mindpumpradio) look for the QUAH post and input your question there. (Sal, Adam & Justin will answer as many questions as they can)
